SELECT count(*) totalCount FROM v_customer a left outer join member b on(b.id = a.block_member_id) WHERE 1=1
AND ( a.name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or a.tel_number like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or a.block_type like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or a.remark like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or b.name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') )
AND a.name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND a.tel_number like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND a.block_type like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND a.remark like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND b.name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND a.is_block = #{isBlock}

SELECT a.id ,a.customer_id ,a.gasapp_member_number ,a.name ,a.tel_number ,a.create_date ,a.update_date ,a.update_member_id ,a.company_id ,a.is_block ,a.block_type ,a.remark ,a.block_member_id ,a.room_id ,a.speaker_id ,a.swear_count ,a.insult_count ,a.state ,a.block_date ,b.name as block_member_name FROM v_customer a left outer join member b on(b.id = a.block_member_id) WHERE 1=1
AND ( a.name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or a.tel_number like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or a.block_type like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or a.remark like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or b.name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%') )
AND a.name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND a.tel_number like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND a.block_type like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND a.remark like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND b.name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
AND a.is_block = #{isBlock}
ORDER BY id DESC Limit #{startNum}, #{pageSize}

SELECT a.id ,a.customer_id ,a.gasapp_member_number ,a.name ,a.tel_number ,a.create_date ,a.update_date ,a.update_member_id ,a.company_id ,a.is_block ,a.block_type ,a.remark ,a.block_member_id ,a.room_id ,a.speaker_id ,a.swear_count ,a.insult_count ,a.state ,a.block_date FROM v_customer a WHERE customer_id = #{id}

SELECT vc.*, rs.read_last_message_id, ( SELECT COUNT(id) FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = r.id AND id > rs.read_last_message_id AND is_system_message = 0 ) AS no_read_count, IFNULL(( SELECT DATEDIFF(NOW(), MAX(create_date)) FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = r.id), -1) AS end_days ,r.state AS room_state, r.end_date AS end_date FROM v_customer vc INNER JOIN v_room r ON vc.room_id = r.id INNER JOIN room_speaker rs ON r.id = rs.room_id AND rs.speaker_id = vc.speaker_id WHERE vc.gasapp_member_number = #{gasappMemberNumber} AND vc.company_id = #{companyId}
SELECT * FROM v_customer WHERE company_id = #{companyId} AND is_block = 1

SELECT r.member_id, r.state AS room_state, ( SELECT read_last_message_id FROM room_speaker WHERE room_speaker.room_id = r.id AND speaker_id = sp.id ) AS read_last_message_id, ( SELECT DATEDIFF( NOW(), MAX(create_date) ) FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = r.id ) AS end_after_day, ( SELECT COUNT(id) FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = r.id AND id > read_last_message_id AND is_system_message = 0 AND message_admin_type = 0 ) AS no_read_count, vc.* FROM v_customer vc INNER JOIN room r ON vc.room_id = r.id INNER JOIN speaker2 sp ON vc.speaker_id = sp.id WHERE vc.company_id = #{companyId} AND vc.gasapp_member_number = #{gasappMemberNumber}
select c.* from SpaceSpeaker as a inner join Speaker as b on a.speaker = b.id inner join Customer as c on c.speaker = b.id where 1=1 and a.space = #{space} and b.iscustomer = 1 limit 1
